entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 17 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11 except minus 17 inland. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 March 2023
